sentences.en: Adam: Oops ! I dropped it again! That is a slippery shrimp!
sentences.cn: 亚当: 噢 喔,又掉了! 那虾子还真滑啊!

sentences.en: Add the shrimp and cook for 30 seconds.
Atanas ordered a shrimp cocktail and a salad.
sentences.cn: 阿塔纳斯点了一份鸡尾冷虾和一份色拉。

sentences.en: Final evaluation of cost - effectiveness analysis of the best shrimp culture model.
sentences.cn: 最终以经济效益为评价指标,分析罗氏沼虾的最佳养殖模式.

sentences.en: He was a shrimp of a boy, about six years old.
sentences.cn: 他是个六岁左右的小家伙.

sentences.en: I also got a microscope set and watched shrimp grow and things like that.
sentences.cn: 我还得到过一个显微镜，观察小虾的成长和这些类似的事情。

sentences.en: In summer midnight snack time, if you come across the Baisha street intersection, a big line of persons sitting by the avenue for taste the spicy shrimp .
sentences.cn: 夏天里消夜时间你如果经过白沙路口就可以看到这儿林荫道上坐了一大排人，没错，他们就是冲着口味虾来的。

sentences.en: Materials: flour, milk, butter, mozzarella, vegetables, meat, shrimp and olive oil.
sentences.cn: 原料: 自发粉或面粉+酵粉, 牛奶, 黄油, 玛苏里拉奶酪, 各种蔬菜, 肉类, 鲜虾及橄榄油.

sentences.en: Shrimp are raised in long uniform ponds, frozen in the nearby packing plant and shipped north.
sentences.cn: 虾放养在清一色的长池子里，再送到附近的包装车间冷冻，最后用船运往北方。

sentences.en: Some use pork or shrimp, and others use chicken.
sentences.cn: 译文:一些饺子用猪肉或虾肉做, 另外一些用鸡肉做.

sentences.en: The host generally pays, and no one needs to hear you gripe about appetizer prices or shrimp count.
sentences.cn: 主人通常都会支付账单，没人想要听到你抱怨关于开胃菜的价格或者小虾的个数。

sentences.en: The scientists were studying a freshwater shrimp commonly found in England.
sentences.cn: 科学家们正在研究一种在英国随处可见的淡水虾.

sentences.en: The shrimp salad is really good. Do you want some?
sentences.cn: 鲜虾色拉真的很不错, 你要来一点 吗 ?

sentences.en: The waitress brought Ellen's shrimp cocktail.
sentences.cn: 女服务员端来了艾伦的虾制开胃品.

sentences.en: Toffler chooses a Cobb salad with grilled shrimp and sparkling water.
sentences.cn: 托夫勒点了一份带有烤虾的柯布沙拉和苏打水.

sentences.en: When it comes to seafood, I like shrimp the best.
sentences.cn: 说到海鲜, 我最喜欢虾.

sentences.en: When the shrimp farm is built it will block the stream.
sentences.cn: 一旦养虾场建起来，将会截断这条河流。

sentences.en: You think the garlic shrimp has garlic in it?
sentences.cn: 大蒜小龙虾里边应该会放大蒜的 吧 ?

trans.tran_en: a small sea creature that you can eat, which has ten legs and a soft shell
